greeting_message: Hello, I'm an intelligent assistant for clinical decision support based on knowledge graph.
warning_message: The backend appears to not have started properly or is currently busy. Please refresh the page or check the docker logs for api-dev.
warning_message_provider: Please note the reliability of the content. Model provider:
create_new_database_msg: Import your own text data or write data in real-time via Webhook to enhance the context of the LLM.
database_header_desc: The knowledge-based database, primarily composed of unstructured text, utilizes vector retrieval for its operations. If any issues arise, you can check the configuration in the file saves/data/database.json.
upload_msg: Click or drag files here to upload
upload_limited: Only JSONL files are supported currently, and files with the same name cannot be added repeatedly.
upload_limited_doc: Only text files such as .pdf, .txt, and .md are supported for upload currently. Additionally, files with the same name cannot be added repeatedly.
settings_header_desc: The configuration could base also change in saves/config/config.yaml
model_config_msg: Please configure the corresponding APIKEY in the src/.env file.
delete_model_msg: Are you sure you want to delete the model?
add_oponai_model: Add models compatible with OpenAI: vllm or Ollama
